sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: '#2E7D32',
    primaryDark: '#1B5E20',
    primaryLight: '#4CAF50',
    primaryGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4CAF50 0%, #2E7D32 100%)',
    secondary: '#FF8F00',
    secondaryDark: '#E65100',
    secondaryLight: '#FFB74D',
    secondaryGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #FFC107 0%, #FF8F00 100%)',
    accent: '#00BCD4',
    accentDark: '#00838F',
    accentLight: '#4DD0E1',
    accentGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4DD0E1 0%, #00BCD4 100%)',
    background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #E8F5E8 0%, #F1F8E9 50%, #E0F2F1 100%)',
    backgroundSolid: '#F1F8E9',
    surface: '#FFFFFF',
    surfaceAlt: '#FAFAFA',
    surfaceGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #FFFFFF 0%, #F8F9FA 100%)',
    text: '#1B5E20',
    textSecondary: '#388E3C',
    textLight: '#81C784',
    border: '#C8E6C9',
    borderLight: '#E8F5E8',
    success: '#4CAF50',
    successGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4CAF50 0%, #66BB6A 100%)',
    warning: '#FF9800',
    warningGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #FF9800 0%, #FFB74D 100%)',
    error: '#F44336',
    errorGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #F44336 0%, #EF5350 100%)',
    info: '#2196F3',
    infoGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #2196F3 0%, #42A5F5 100%)',
    shadow: 'rgba(46, 125, 50, 0.15)',
    shadowDark: 'rgba(46, 125, 50, 0.25)',
    cardShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(46, 125, 50, 0.12)',
    hoverShadow: '0 12px 40px rgba(46, 125, 50, 0.18)',
  },
  fonts: {
    primary: "'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif",
    mono: "'Fira Code', 'Monaco', 'Consolas', monospace",
  },
  fontSizes: {
    xs: '12px',
    sm: '14px',
    base: '16px',
    lg: '18px',
    xl: '20px',
    '2xl': '24px',
    '3xl': '30px',
    '4xl': '36px',
  },
  fontWeights: {
    light: 300,
    normal: 400,
    medium: 500,
    semibold: 600,
    bold: 700,
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: '4px',
    sm: '8px',
    md: '16px',
    lg: '24px',
    xl: '32px',
    '2xl': '48px',
    '3xl': '64px',
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: '4px',
    md: '8px',
    lg: '12px',
    xl: '16px',
    full: '50%',
  },
  shadows: {
    sm: '0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',
    md: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    lg: '0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',
    xl: '0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)',
  },
  breakpoints: {
    sm: '640px',
    md: '768px',
    lg: '1024px',
    xl: '1280px',
  },
  transitions: {
    fast: '150ms ease-in-out',
    normal: '250ms ease-in-out',
    slow: '350ms ease-in-out',
  },
};
